Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Ahh, but don't worry about my problems.
I hope you have a nice, relaxing time in
our village.<sp:0:4:0>Have you tried the fresh milk they make
on the <clr:0000>farm<clr:ffff> up the hill? I never start my
morning without a glass.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, it's you... <sp:5:0:0>Did you come to check up
on me because you were worried?<sp:0:4:0>I'm fine. I have high hopes for the <clr:0000>special
food<clr:ffff> my grandfather created with <clr:0000>a fellow
villager<clr:ffff> in his day.<sp:0:4:0>It was too ahead of its time to catch on,
but even though I was young when I tried
it, I never forgot its <clr:0000>gooey mouthfeel<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>If I could reproduce it, then I'd have
something that could stand up to Cece!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Except...<sp:5:0:0>I can't remember <clr:0000>who<clr:ffff> in the
village my grandfather worked with or
<clr:0000>what they created<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>And now that I think of it, <sp:5:0:0>it also had a unique,
pungent scent. If I could just smell that <clr:0000>aroma<clr:ffff>
again, it might jog my memory.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00><clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>! Of course!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It makes sense that my grandfather would
have been working with someone from the
farm up there.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's a miracle that Koyin not only found
the recipe but managed to reproduce it.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>But this is great news! It's a clear sign
that we ought to make Hateno cheese a
<clr:0000>new village staple<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>That ought to swing the election for me.<sp:0:4:0>Let me pay you for that cheese, OK?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Unconscious_00>Sorry about that.<sp:0:4:0>I didn't mean to imply that the unique,
pungent aroma was you.<sp:0:4:0>I've been preoccupied with coming up
with a new <clr:0000>signature staple<clr:ffff>, and I guess
I have interesting smells on the brain.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice>Yes...that's the aroma I remember...<sp:5:0:0>
Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Wait just a moment...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>This is it... <sp:5:0:0>This is just what I've been
looking for! <sp:5:0:0>My grandfather developed
it with a fellow villager!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Haha, don't you worry about me. <sp:5:0:0>I have
a <clr:0000>secret plan <clr:ffff>in the works.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Although it rests on remembering just
<clr:0000>who<clr:ffff> in the village my grandfather worked
with and <clr:0000>what they created<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I distinctly remember its <clr:0000>creamy, melty<clr:ffff>
mouthfeel, at least.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>If I could just smell that unique, pungent aroma
again, it might jog my memory.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wh— <sp:5:0:0>Am I smelling things, <sp:5:0:0>or do I detect
a certain <clr:0000>unique, pungent aroma<clr:ffff>?!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Oh, you're...the traveler I saw at
Ventest Clothing, right?<sp:0:4:0>Did you come to check up on me because
you were worried?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Yeah...I lost my head a little there. I'm not
too proud of the way I behaved.<sp:0:4:0>But don't you worry about me. <sp:5:0:0>I have a
couple <clr:0000>tricks up my sleeve against Cece<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I might not be able to pull one of them off
in time for the mayoral election.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm focusing on the second plan—to
bring back a <clr:0000>taste<clr:ffff> no one's tried here
in years.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>I don't think I have time to pull off my other idea
before the mayoral election.<sp:0:4:0>So I've got to make this one work...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Believe me, it's worth every rupee!<sp:0:4:0>Now then! <sp:5:0:0>I should get in touch with
Koyin so we can start preparing for
mass production.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll ask the Hateno Village <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>
and some <clr:0000>traveling merchants<clr:ffff> to add it to
their wares too.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>Shouldn't take much more than that to tip
the election my way. <sp:5:0:0>You should come out
to watch it happen!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>Way back when, <sp:5:0:0>my grandfather worked
with <clr:0000>someone from the village<clr:ffff> to create
a special kind of food.<sp:0:4:0>It was too ahead of its time to catch on,<sp:5:0:0>
so it never went further than the first trial
run, but I never forgot it.<sp:0:4:0>Even today, I can still recall the <clr:0000>gooey
mouthfeel<clr:ffff> of the one bite my grandfather
shared with me.<sp:0:4:0>In the back of my mind, I've always
wanted to make it a <clr:0000>signature staple<clr:ffff>
of this village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>If I could accomplish that, then I'd have
something that could stand up to Cece!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Except...<sp:5:0:0>I can't remember <clr:0000>who<clr:ffff> in the
village my grandfather worked with or
<clr:0000>what they created<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>And now that I think of it, it also had a unique,
pungent scent. If I could just smell that <clr:0000>aroma<clr:ffff>
again, it might jog my memory.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>You'll have to excuse me. I have things
I need to take care of.<sp:0:4:0>Please don't worry about my problems
and just have a nice, relaxing time in
our village.<sp:0:4:0>Have you tried the fresh milk they make
on the <clr:0000>farm<clr:ffff> up the hill? Having a glass is
a nice way to unwind before bed.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>The <clr:0000>mayoral election<clr:ffff> begins soon, if I
remember right. Thanks to you, I should
be a shoo-in to win.<sp:0:4:0>I think I'll head out to meet <clr:0000>Sophie<clr:ffff> soon.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Ahh, but don't worry about my problems.
I hope you have a nice, relaxing time in
our village.<sp:0:4:0>Have you tried the fresh milk they make
on the <clr:0000>farm<clr:ffff> up the hill? I never start my
morning without a glass.
